pages.text: You can engage in trade with villagers, traders and merchants found across all dimensions. Some have really nice items, such as mastery armor, others can give you a loot chest with random loot.$(br2)Villagers are at the core of the economy. You can sell items, like cobble, stone, wood and more, to get copper coins.

pages.title: The Economy
pages.text: You can pick villagers up by shift-right clicking them with an empty hand. You can also craft a $(item)trading post$(), which will allow you to interact with all trades in the area. In this manner, you can create your own villager trading hall.$(br2)Specific villagers are made by placing a villager next to a work station. Place a villager next to a smithing table and they become a weaponsmith.

pages.title: The Bojangler
pages.text: A block wrangler, or Bojangler in the native dialect, is a merchant who sells specialized, uncraftable deco blocks. There are 4 varieties:$(br2)$(l)Bojangler$()$(li)Station: Pyrope Block$(br)$(l)Inner Bojangler$()$(li)Station: Horizonite Block$(br)$(l)Mid Bojangler$()$(li)Station: Emerald Block$(br)$(l)Outer Bojangler$()$(li)Station: Diamond Block
